Pollymer Changelog
==================

v. 1.2.0 (10-20-2016)

  * repackaged using browserify
  * new logging

v. 1.1.3 (11-27-2015)

  * npm availability, new on() semantics.

v. 1.1.2 (05-10-2014)

  * Adding access to "lastRequest" info.

v. 1.1.1 (05-10-2014)

  * Fixed crashing issue when abort() called on fresh object.

v. 1.1.0 (04-28-2014)

  * Support for RequireJS (AMD).

v. 1.0.0 (01-31-2013)

  * Initial Release.
